title: What are the recent technologies in telecommunication? - Quora

response.answer_text: In my opinion, cloud telephony is the latest technology in the telephone industry. Before cloud telephony technology, SMEs and Startups were using traditional PBX systems at office premises. But now, the Cloud telephony service has transformed the business's internal and external communication systems. It enables organizations to switch from a traditional PBX system to a cloud telephony solution without investing a single penny on expensive hardware infrastructure. Because cloud telephony technology has multiple features. It seems that cloud telephony will help the enterprise to make an influential expansion. And, Many marketing experts expects believes that between 2020 to 2029, cloud telephony would remain in demand.
IoT, Wireless connections, Cloud computing, 5G network.
